Grayson: s campaign spokesman pointed to 281 pieces of legislation that passed during the 113th Congress, but none of the 10 bills sponsored by Grayson were the actual ones that passed. Other versions of those bills were the ones that passed.
However: when it comes to actually passing bills into law, Grayson's claim falls short. None of his bills became law during the 113th Congress.
Experts caution that measuring productiv: Writing minor or routine bills does not equate to participating in crafting major legislation, and the number of major bills passed in recent congresses has been limited.
